meanings.definition: The quality or state of being treacherous.
meanings.sent1: Her treacherousness was evident when she lied to her best friend.
meanings.sent2: The treacherousness of the villain knew no bounds.
meanings.sent3: The treacherousness of the cat pretending to be innocent was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The treacherousness of the storm caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent5: The treacherousness of the icy road made driving extremely dangerous.

meanings.definition: The act of betraying someone or something.
meanings.sent1: His treacherousness was revealed when he double-crossed his partner.
meanings.sent2: The treacherousness of the spy's actions shocked everyone.
meanings.sent3: The treacherousness of the cookie jar luring the child was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The treacherousness of the waves pulling the boat under was terrifying.
meanings.sent5: The treacherousness of the slippery slope made hiking a risky adventure.
